description:
Minnie Driver (Modern Love, Cinderella) shares a special memory about her experience working with Robin Williams, she gives a behind the scenes peek into the filming of Good Will Hunting, and Minnie talks about what inspired her new podcast. 


To hear more from Minnie, check out her podcast, Minnie Questions, especially her episode with Justin from July 14th, 2021!
